data.question: What year did Trofimenko introduce tris(pyrazolyl)borate?
What is the final addition to the tris(azolyl)borate ligand family mentioned in the text?
What type of structure does tris(1,2,3-triazolyl)borate form with sodium?
Which metal salts led to homoleptic complexes (HCs) when reacted with tris(1,2,3-triazolyl)borate?
What is the yield of tris(1,2,3-triazolyl)borate when synthesized?
What is the geometry of the homoleptic complexes formed with Fe, Co, and Ni?
What is the role of sodium borohydride in the synthesis of tris(1,2,3-triazolyl)borate?
data.answer: It reacts with 1,2,3-triazole to form tris(1,2,3-triazolyl)borate.

data.question: How does the coordination of Na1 and Na2 differ in the structure of tris(1,2,3-triazolyl)borate?
data.answer: Na1 is coordinated to six N2 atoms from two separate ligands, while Na2 is coordinated to six N3 atoms from six separate ligands.

data.question: Why are Fe, Co, and Ni complexes with tris(1,2,3-triazolyl)borate considered homoleptic?
data.answer: Because they form complexes with two tridentate ligands bound to a metal center, resulting in an octahedral geometry.

data.question: What determines the structure formed by tris(1,2,3-triazolyl)borate with different metals?
data.answer: The choice of metal and its oxidation state.

data.question: How does the Cd coordination polymer differ from the first row complexes?
data.answer: It binds to the metal through N3 atoms and has a distinct structure.

data.question: What is the significance of the ambidentate nature of tris(1,2,3-triazolyl)borate?
data.answer: It allows for a variety of structures to be formed based on the metal and its oxidation state.

data.question: Is tris(1,2,3-triazolyl)borate ambidentate?
Was tris(1,2,3-triazolyl)borate previously synthesized before this study?
Do Fe, Co, and Ni form coordination polymers with tris(1,2,3-triazolyl)borate?
Is the Fe complex of tris(1,2,3-triazolyl)borate in a high-spin state?
Does the Cd coordination polymer have the same topology as the structure of tris(1,2,3-triazolyl)borate with encapsulated Na1?
Are the bond lengths of Fe, Co, and Ni complexes with tris(1,2,3-triazolyl)borate comparable to those with tris(pyrazolyl)borate?
Is the synthesis of tris(1,2,3-triazolyl)borate conducted under an oxygen atmosphere?
Does tris(1,2,3-triazolyl)borate form molecular homoleptic complexes with all transition metals?
